effect.en: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon VMAX.
effect.pt: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon VMAX.
effect.de: Verhindere allen Schaden, der diesem Pokémon durch Attacken von Pokémon-VMAX deines Gegners zugefügt wird.

effect.en: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
effect.pt: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
effect.de: Lege 1 Spezial-Energie vom Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners auf seinen Ablagestapel.
